channel.title: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME
channel.description:
I was thinking of what class should i be i am a human, which of these should i be??
-Warrior -Mage - or Warlock
and help me wit teh names :D

item.title: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

rouge is simply the best, they do alot of damage per second but when facing a warrior or paladin it comes down to skill

Read full topic
item.source: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME

item.title: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

God… I used to be like that. But then, I figured out how much of a noob I am for even asking those stuff. Why would WoW make a class that is better than all of the others? They wouldn’t do that. Actually, the best class is what you like best. If you play a class you don’t like, you will treat it under and won’t play with it as much. But if you play a class you do like, mine being the rogue, then it will be easier for you because you enjoy playing with it. (Don’t be sick minded.)

Read full topic

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:16, topic:169135”]Your funny, uh im 14 and i can get anything from my parents because our family is loaded… Its fun being a rich dude… and if you try and kidnap me i better be in a limo -.-

Lol, wow is good but i prefer this for some strange reason, ima try out Wow P servers one day…[/quote]

you are spoiled…

my neighbor is a multi millionare and he still has to give his parents a really good reason in order to get something. or he has to pay for it himself.

item.title: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:20, topic:169135”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=228805.msg1968593#msg1968593 date=1199200022]
If you dont have anything good to say, Dont post it.
[/quote]

PM that next time, instead of backseat modding, like you tend to do.

shut the fuck up

No you.

again, shut the fuck up. “I mean it’s not like you’re unnecessarily butting into this trying to stir shit or anything.”

No you.

Warlock. Pwnage.

@ Danielle<–lol
Danny, atleast we have the money to enjoy the wonder of WoW, if you want it just nag your parents… if they’re rich enough for £120 a year…

The last time I used the female counterpart to a male’s name in an effort to diss was in first grade. Grow up. Learn that the amount of money your parents make has nothing to do with your personal ability, and everything to do with a false sense of self-worth.

WTS [Danielle Troll]
plz stop wit da trollin’

Moo Moo PK used Danielle already.
Original Daniel already called you a troll.

Think of something original.

Your funny, uh im 14 and i can get anything from my parents because our family is loaded… Its fun being a rich dude… and if you try and kidnap me i better be in a limo -.-

Lol, wow is good but i prefer this for some strange reason, ima try out Wow P servers one day…

You realize that having rich parents is nothing to be proud of.[/quote]
no

Read full topic

[/quote]
whats wrong with shaman?[/quote]

yeah shamans are pimping

<3 rogues though yeah they are easy to play but they are so much fun at level 70 plus you can easily gank a warlock on a rogue (unless you suck ass)

and LOL at the mage keyboard that is so true

item.title: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:13, topic:169135”][quote author=M00 M00 Pk link=topic=228805.msg1978968#msg1978968 date=1199571877]
@ Danielle<–lol
Danny, atleast we have the money to enjoy the wonder of WoW, if you want it just nag your parents… if they’re rich enough for £120 a year…
[/quote]

Yeah that must be it: I’m obviously too poor to afford $30 a month. Couldn’t possibly be that I tried it, and thought the game was shit, before even bringing in the fact that the apparent ‘wonder’ of wow costs a lot of money compared to other much better games.

I actually work, and don’t rely on mummy and daddy to buy everything for me. You know, the whole independence thing that should start kicking in for you when you hit 15 or so in a couple years.

Very nice call with Danielle by the way, I thought you couldn’t come up with anything more moronic and cliche before I read the assumption that I can’t afford $30 a month. Keeps me guessing.[/quote]

Your funny, uh im 14 and i can get anything from my parents because our family is loaded… Its fun being a rich dude… and if you try and kidnap me i better be in a limo -.-

Lol, wow is good but i prefer this for some strange reason, ima try out Wow P servers one day…

Read full topic

item.title: WoW = world of warcraft WHAT CLASS HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

Ok, i do not suggest rolling mage, not the most fun of them.
Warrior = Extremely hard to level up.
Warlock = My reccommendation

Locks get so many cool abilities, they are pretty OP.
But, spend the time to level and gear up a warrior (Warriors are the most gear dependant class in the game) and it wtfpwnz.

Choice is urz, just don’t roll troll k

Read full topic
